duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and audit all service and billing documentation to ensure compliance with OPWDD regulations and procedures
Ensure compliance with all applicable federal, state, and local laws, regulations, and policies
Monitor the timely submission of service documentation and maintain correspondence with departments to acquire documentation
Train staff on appropriate procedures and maintain audit readiness
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of OPWDD, DOH, and other governing entity changes and regulations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree and substantial related experience with OPWDD required
